posts.post_content: Suits greatly to Mirrodin as addition to the ![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol)-sorcery discards like [Ostracize](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ostracize) and [Duress](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Duress). But when not playing Mirrodin-block-constructed, i'd definitely prefer Duress over this one since i most often won't encounter artifact creatures or artifact lands.

posts.post_content: Not a lot of cards with [Glissa Sunseeker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Glissa Sunseeker) on them. At least, I'm pretty sure that's Glissa. Wish there was more of her, I read the Mirrodin cycle's books and she's an awesome character.

posts.post_content: I am not sure what you guys have as a metagame but jitte and swords of any sort are pretty big in the legacy metagame here so I wouldn't mind running these at all. Chances are you'll hit something or at least make them show you what they're up to. I still agree that duress andcabal therapy are better but this isn't bad and deserves a little more credit.
